phrases: He had an offer for an anime?
They usually start to make offers early on.
He even said he went there just to meet us.
Do not tell Azuki anything, though.
I do not want to get her hopes up.
But it will become one, right?
If you make something good, it will eventually get turned into an anime.
It is the person from yesterday, Katou's friend.
She is making her debut as a voice actress.
She is only had roles like Student A, though.
Wait, you actually looked that up?
Well, I just could not calm down when I realized there was a company willing to make an anime of Reversi.
You cannot get so worked up over something this small.
It is not like we have gotten an actual anime.
And if we do manage to get one, it will be far in the future.
The only thing to do now is to concentrate on making our manga good.
Looks like this is the first time you can afford to take a break over New Year's.
I will not work from about the 30th until the 3rd.
That said, I will probably end up working anyways since I will have nothing else to do.
Want To go on a vacation?
Kaya and I are planning for our first vacation since our honeymoon.
When you went to Kinugawa for three days and two nights?
It is been four and a half years since we went to that inn in Kinugawa, so we wanted to visit it again.
Kaya wants to invite you this time.
The two of you should go.
I would just be in the way.
Since we are always working together, it would feel weird not to have you around for that sort of thing.
Just think of it as a company trip.
Ah, this is like heaven on Earth.
You sound like an old geezer, but I cannot think of anything more fitting.
You do not mind me being here, right?
It is more fun with the three of us.
Kicking back like this really is great.
It is only great because we work so hard.
If I always came here, I would not appreciate it as much.
You guys are late, so I started drinking already!
Akito, thanks for treating me well this year.
You always look out for Akito.
Thanks, but I do not really drink
I am drinking, I am drinking.
Now, it is time to begin the traditional ping pong competition!
We will do it, we will do it!
Kaya, you hit it too hard!
For a couple of guys, you two sure are weak!
I will switch to my left hand just for you.
When I move around, everything spins...
We are going to watch the first sunrise of the new year.
Let us do our best this year, too!
Sending Azuki a Happy New Year text.
It would be strange if you two did anything else.
I wish for another good year.
Let us turn Reversi into an even bigger hit.
Mashiro, are not you going to wish for anything?
Are you supposed to wish for something on the first sunrise of the new year?
Is not that supposed to be on your first visit to a shrine?
That is what we normally do.
If you were not Miho's boyfriend, I would have you for myself!
I am really glad that you came along, Mashiro.
Because it is good to be like this.
Do not you feel happy, too?
This is probably the most fun New Year's I have ever had.
Next time, Miho will be with us.
I am still wide awake, though.
I was just about to go to sleep myself.
Maybe I should sleep here, then.
During summer break of our third year in middle school, we slept under the same roof every night.
It feels nostalgic, but also like it was just yesterday.
You could say we have been working nonstop ever since then.
There were hard times, but it was fun.
The Luck from Conceit, Hard Work, Luck.
I think meeting you was the luckiest thing that has ever happened to me.
If you had not asked me to make manga with you, I do not know what I would be doing now.
You would have found some other goal to work towards.
I did not have any of these outrageous dreams before
like becoming the number one manga artist in Japan, or marrying Azuki Miho.
Those dreams are right at my fingertips now.
Mind if I say something pretentious?
Sure, say any snobby thing like A man who is away from home need feel no shame.
I think manga and life are the same thing.
A weekly manga lasts for a week, and a life lasts until you die.
It is making the best of whatever time you are given.
Conceit and Luck are important, but the most important one is
That was not pretentious at all.
I think you are spot on.
Do not forget Strength of body, Strength of mind, and lastly, Guts!
When we get back, it is back to work!
You two could have taken some more time off, but you are really eager to get back to work.
I was not expecting you to finish this quickly.
Since we had free time, we thought we would make the manuscript even better.
We have already had a reprint of your second volume, which went on sale on the 4th.
If you add in the total from your first volume, that makes 500,000 copies already.
No, its second volume is not on sale yet.
Right now, Reversi is selling more.
If it keeps going like this, you may catch up!
Both of them are plenty popular, but it is only been six months.
However, the CROW anime will end this summer.
In our present situation, it has to be one of these two.
Choosing another work by the same author would be the best way to transition the viewers.
However, at the current rate Zombie Gun' s plot is progressing, its anime would catch up quickly.
But Reversi would be harder to catch up with since each of its chapters is very dense.
Dense with content that kids cannot understand!
If we want a wide audience, then it has to be Zombie!
Th-That is something the production staff will take into consideration.
Aida, you sound like you are really pushing for Reversi.
Yuujirou said that he does not want to do an anime right now.
So, it has to be Reversi.
He knows there is been some offers for an anime,
but he thinks it will not happen for a long time.
Then, ask Hattori what he thinks about this.
If he says okay, is Reversi definitely getting an anime?
We have to ask him first if he wants the fall slot.
There is no point in discussing this until we have heard his answer.
And ask Yuujirou one more time.
The Chief Editor wants to know if you would want it to start this fall.
So, you are saying yes, then?
I need to think about this.
There should not be any problems with this.
How many years did the CROW anime end up running for?
We would rather have a work that we are satisfied with instead of one that has a long run!
At worst, going by what Ashirogi said, the series could finish before the anime even starts.
If they could just keep the series going while the anime is on air...
They will not agree to keep it going unless they are completely satisfied with it.
Well, I am happy about this, but I cannot give you an answer that easily.
Normally you would say either An anime?! or All right!, and that would be it.
A-Anyways, just let me think about this first!
So, I am just confirming this with you,
but right now, Zombie Gun should not be made into an anime yet, right?
The further ahead we are, the easier it will be to adapt this into an anime.
I think you need to continue for at least three more years before we consider it.
So, the anime that will start after CROW ends will probably be Reversi.
If I tell Ashirogi, they will definitely want to do the anime.
It is been their dream ever since they started to draw manga.
How about I tell them that in order to have an anime, they have to keep the series going for the duration of the anime?
However, if that causes the manga to get boring...
Maybe I should be honest and tell the higher-ups that the manga might end before the anime even begins.
But if I do that, we might lose the offer.
In the end, maybe it is best to simply keep quiet and just agree to the anime.
But that is just being irresponsible.
This is not something I can decide by myself.
but the higher-ups are asking me if we would like to have an anime for Reversi in the fall.
It is not a sure thing!
They just wanted to know whether you would want to do it this fall or not!
Of course we would want that!
There is no way we would not!
If we agree, then it is all settled, right?
No, it is not really decided yet.
Continue the series until the anime ends?
I mean that when the confrontation between the white and black demons, Weiss and Schwarz, concludes,
the three of us would sit down and figure out what happens next.
Were you given the condition that the series cannot end while the anime is running?
No, they have not gotten into that kind of detail yet.
But when you consider the anime production company's position,
they would want it to last as long as possible.
An anime starting in the fall...
At our pace, by that time the confrontation between Schwarz and Weiss will be over.
Do we have to keep the series going for as long as the anime is running?
Like I said, that is not set in stone.
However, if I tell the higher-ups that you are planning to end the series right around when the anime starts,
this offer may be pulled off the table.
And I would feel guilty if I gave them the go-ahead for the anime without telling them about this.
So, if you could continue it until the anime ends...
No, if you could just tell me you will keep it going a year into the anime, I would feel a lot better.
Saikou, there is no way we can say no.
We will not end our manga until a year into the anime.
Can you guarantee that the quality of the manga will not drop at all?
I do not want to lower its quality by prolonging it!
Did not we just decide not to do that?!
But you want it made into an anime, right?!
By this fall, the manga will have been running for a year.
That is a year's worth of story material for the anime to work with.
By that logic, it would be best to pass up this opportunity and wait until you end the series,
and if an offer comes for an anime after that, we should take it then.
We have finally got an offer, so we cannot pass it up!
There is no way we can miss this chance!
I just have to work really hard on the story.
I will make it work, somehow.
You mean you will intentionally drag it out, even if the quality suffers?
I will see to it that the quality does not drop!
This is not like you two.
Well, I was the one who wanted you to continue the manga, but this is just strange.
We want an anime, but not if it means dropping the quality of our work.
before I started to draw manga,
I made a promise to Azuki Miho, the voice actress.
That our manga would become an anime, and that she would play the lead female role in it.
And that once that dream came true, we would get married.
Since then, neither of us has strayed from that path.
We have not gone on dates, or even seen each other.
I know it sounds ridiculous, but it is the truth.
Takagi asked me back then if I wanted to become a manga author with him.
And at the same time, coincidentally, this dream was born.
That is why I resolved to do it together with him.
Takagi is trying to fulfill that dream for me.
So that is the reason you are so obsessed with getting an anime?
I do not want our manga to get boring just for the sake of getting an anime and fulfilling my personal dream.
Just like you said, if an anime offer comes after we are done with our series, we can take it then.
Even if the quality of our manga goes down?
Azuki would not want that either!
It looks like I was wrong.
I should just honestly say I want to do it.
Because Ashirogi Mutou wants to do it.
Just do your series the way you want to.
I do not care when it ends.
If they complain, I will accept responsibility for it.
To have your work become an anime, and to have Azuki Miho play the heroine in it.
If that happens, then you get married.
And it is wonderful that you have had that dream since middle school.
In order to fulfill it, let us do this anime.
I have become too much of an adult.
I may have lost that innocent way of thinking.
They asked if I wanted an anime.
That is all there is to it.
Hey, Hattori came by here earlier, right?
So, why do you guys look so relaxed?
Maybe it is because you are here!
So Ashirogi are hyped up for it.
So please go ahead with Reversi's anime adaptation!
Niizuma wrote these for the anime.
But you said it was too early for an adaptation!
As an Ashirogi fan, you must be happy for them, right?
I am happy, but if their volume sales surpass mine, then I will not be anymore.
If they get an anime, they might make a comeback in their sales.
Even so, there is no way we can stop a Reversi anime from happening.
If I said I wanted an anime of Zombie Gun, what would happen then?
But I have said over and over that it is too early for that!
The anime would catch up way too quickly!
Then all I have to do is create a bunch of original stories for the anime!
I had simply assumed that we should turn the anime down because it would catch up to the manga.
But I did not account for Niizuma's abilities.
He can keep churning out these original storyboards for the anime!
He is made them with an anime in mindframes that will look good on TV.
We are going to do Zombie Gun!
I will make it the true number one series!
I already told Ashirogi that it was likely we would do their series as a fall anime.
I never told you to ask the authors.
However, I also expected that you would say we should not do Zombie Gun.
I should have been more careful in asking.
They have already been informed, and both Niizuma and Ashirogi are excited about it.
Are they both okay with this fall?
No matter which one we choose, both Zombie Gun and Reversi will eventually get an anime anyway.
Reversi has to be done now!
we might be overtaken in both volume sales and survey rankings.
I will have my decision by the end of the day.
Th-That is why I told you nothing was decided yet!
If Niizuma is drawing storyboards for the anime, then Zombie Gun has a stronger case.
It would follow up CROW, and it does seem like a more likely choice.
The Chief Editor will decide, but you probably should not get your hopes up.
So, why do you two look so unmotivated?
Even though the super cute Kaya is here...
I thought I should tell you news like this in person.
It is about the anime adaptation...
Well, we still do not know if we are getting an anime or not.
Cruel reality stands in the way of dreams!
As soon as I reach my goals, it all falls through again
We met after such a long time
Has the mood changed for us?
It seemed like more fun back then
Do not stop screaming, do not stop struggling
You have done enough for others
I still, still have something I have not told you yet
Beyond each of my dreams lies yet another dream
Whenever I am close to fulfilling my goals, all effort becomes fruitless
We walk ahead, hold each other, and with little things
we support each other to reach what we promised
When we lack confidence, we put a hand to our heart
and reread the pages we assembled into a story
They lead up to today and continue into the morrow
until the day that our dreams come true
